All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.EventListener, Figure, FigureChangeListener, java.io.Serializable, Storable, TextHolder
public class TextFigure
extends AttributeFigure
implements FigureChangeListener, TextHolder

A text figure.

Version:
5.3
See Also:
TextTool, Serialized Form

Inner Class Summary

          Listener interested in Figure changes.

updateLocation

protected void updateLocation()
